message.content:
1. The study is focused on children with JHS.
2. The study aims to determine the effectiveness of a physiotherapist-prescribed exercise programme.
3. The exercise programme is focused on knee joint strength and control.
4. The study aims to compare the effectiveness of the exercise programme to no treatment.
5. The study aims to determine if the range in which these exercises are performed affects outcomes.
6. The study is focused on reducing knee pain.

messages.content:
Statement: This study aimed to (i) determine if a physiotherapist-prescribed exercise programme focused on knee joint strength and control is effective in reducing knee pain in children with JHS compared to no treatment, and (ii) whether the range in which these exercises are performed affects outcomes.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
